Text: Doesn't work on LGP970 Optimus Black upgraded to ICS, just give out a black screen after license verifying

Works for me.. 

1.Install APK 
2.Copy 'com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftA7HM' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb/' (If you have installed previous version no need to download main obb)
3.Extract patch 1041.OBB to 'sdcard/Android/Obb/com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftA7HM' folder
4.Launch the game (run online@ 1st run)
